verses.verse: In the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> began <S%H29>Abijah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

He <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4322>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H222>Uriel<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%> There was <S%H4421>war<s%> between <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam.<s%>

<S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H631>joined<s%> <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H631>with<s%> an <S%H2428>army<s%> of valiant <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H1368>men:<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> against him with <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> who were mighty <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

<S%H29>Abijah<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6787>Zemaraim,<s%> which is in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H3379>me,<s%> Jeroboam and all <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

Ought you not to <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> even to him and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> by a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt?<s%>

Yet <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against his <S%H113>lord.<s%>

There were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to him <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H582>fellows,<s%> who <S%H553>strengthened<s%> themselves against <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> when <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> was <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tenderhearted,<s%> and could not <S%H2388>withstand<s%> <S%H6440>them.<s%>

"Now you <S%H559>think<s%> to <S%H2388>withstand<s%> the <S%H6440>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> and you are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and there are with you the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%> which <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> you for <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H5080>Haven't<s%> you driven out the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> for yourselves after the ways of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of other <S%H776>lands?<s%> so that whoever <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> himself with a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> the same may be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> of those who are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

"But as for <S%H3068>us,<s%> Yahweh is our <S%H430>God,<s%> and we have not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3548>him;<s%> and we have priests <S%H8334>ministering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in their <S%H4399>work:<s%>

and they <S%H6999>burn<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> and every <S%H6153>evening<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%> They also set the show <S%H3899>bread<s%> in order on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table;<s%> and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> with its <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%> every <S%H6153>evening:<s%> for we <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>instruction<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> but you have forsaken <S%H5800>him.<s%>

<S%H430>Behold,<s%> God is with us at our <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H7321>alarm<s%> to sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> against <S%H1121>you.<s%> Children of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3898>don't<s%> fight against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> for you shall not <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>"

But <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> caused an <S%H3993>ambush<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6440>them:<s%> so they were before <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H3993>ambush<s%> was behind <S%H310>them.<s%>

When <S%H3063>Judah<s%> looked <S%H6437>back,<s%> <S%H4421>behold,<s%> the battle was <S%H6440>before<s%> and <S%H268>behind<s%> <S%H6817>them;<s%> and they cried to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounded<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> gave a <S%H7321>shout:<s%> and as the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> it <S%H430>happened,<s%> that God <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H29>Abijah<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> them with a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter:<s%> so there fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3665>brought<s%> under at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H553>prevailed,<s%> because they <S%H8172>relied<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> from <S%H1008>him,<s%> Bethel with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H3466>Jeshanah<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns.<s%>
<S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H6113>didn't<s%> recover <S%H3581>strength<s%> again in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H29>Abijah.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> and he died.

But <S%H29>Abijah<s%> grew <S%H2388>mighty,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> to himself <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

The <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> and his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and his <S%H1697>sayings,<s%> are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H4097>commentary<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5714>Iddo.<s%>
